name: MLB The Show 23-PS5
detail: MLB® The Show™ 23 gets you closer than ever to living your Baseball dreams on the diamond. Shock the game and Own The Show™ with your favorite players, your favorite rivalries, and all your favorite MLB® moments.

name: MLB® The Show™ 23: The Captain Edition – PS4™ with PS5™ Entitlement
detail: MLB® The Show™ 23 gets you closer than ever to living your Baseball dreams on the diamond. Shock the game and Own The Show™ with your favorite players, your favorite rivalries, and all your favorite MLB® moments.

name: God of War™ Ragnarok Launch Edition – PS5
detail: Set out on an epic and unflinching journey as Kratos and Atreus struggle with holding on and letting go. Witness the changing dynamic of their relationship as they prepare for war; Atreus hungers for knowledge to help him grasp the prophecy of “Loki”, as Kratos struggles to free himself from the past and be the father his son needs.

name: God of War™ Ragnarok Collector’s Edition – PS5 & PS4
detail: Set out on an epic and unflinching journey as Kratos and Atreus struggle with holding on and letting go. Witness the changing dynamic of their relationship as they prepare for war; Atreus hungers for knowledge to help him grasp the prophecy of “Loki”, as Kratos struggles to free himself from the past and be the father his son needs. All the while, the eyes of Asgard watch their every move…

name: The Last of Us™ Part I - PS5
detail: Experience the emotional storytelling and unforgettable characters of Joel and Ellie in The Last of Us, winner of over 200 Game of the Year awards and now rebuilt for PlayStation®5. Enjoy a total overhaul of the original experience, faithfully reproduced but incorporating modernized gameplay, improved controls and expanded accessibility options. Plus, feel immersed with improved effects and enhanced exploration and combat. The Last of Us™ Part I includes the complete The Last of Us single-player story (PS5™) and celebrated prequel chapter, Left Behind.

name: MLB® The Show™ 22 - PS5
detail: Every pitch. Every hit. Every win. Make your mark and Own The Show in the ultimate MLB® experience.

name: UNCHARTED™: Legacy of Thieves Collection - PS5
detail: Play as Nathan Drake and Chloe Frazer in their own standalone adventures as they are forced to confront their pasts and forge their own legacies. The UNCHARTED™: Legacy of Thieves Collection includes the critically acclaimed single-player stories from both UNCHARTED™ 4: A Thief’s End and UNCHARTED™: The Lost Legacy, remastered for the PS5™ console.

name: Gran Turismo 7 – 25th Anniversary Edition - PS5 & PS4
detail: Gran Turismo® 7 brings together the very best features of the Real Driving Simulator.

name: Horizon Forbidden West™ Launch Edition - PS5
detail: Join Aloy as she braves the Forbidden West – a majestic but dangerous frontier that conceals mysterious new threats. Explore distant lands, fight bigger and more awe-inspiring machines, and encounter astonishing new tribes as you return to the far-future, post-apocalyptic world of Horizon.

name: DEATH STRANDING™ Director's Cut - PS5
detail: From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded and remastered for the PlayStation®5 console in this definitive Director’s Cut. In the future, a mysterious event known as the DEATH STRANDING has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society.

name: Ghost of Tsushima™ Director's Cut - PS5
detail: Experience the expanded Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT, featuring all additional content released to date. Forge a new path and wage an unconventional war for the freedom of Tsushima and explore a new story on Iki Island.

name: Destruction AllStars - PS5
detail: The roar of the crowd… the growl of the engines… the crunch of metal… stars and cars collide in the global phenomenon Destruction AllStars.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart - PS5
detail: Blast your way through an interdimensional adventure with Ratchet and Clank.

name: The Nioh Collection - PS5
detail: Discover the complete Nioh saga with all six major expansions included. Battle the yokai threat at a targeted 120fps (requires 120Hz display) with ultra-fast load times.

name: Returnal - PS5
detail: Break the cycle. Through relentless roguelike gameplay, you’ll discover that just as the planet changes with every cycle, so do the items at your disposal. Every loop offers new combinations, forcing you to push your boundaries and approach combat with a different strategy each time.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales Ultimate Edition - PS5
detail: Experience the rise of Miles Morales as the new hero masters incredible, explosive new powers to become his own Spider-Man.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales - PS5
detail: Experience the rise of Miles Morales as the new hero masters incredible, explosive new powers to become his own Spider-Man.

name: Demon's Souls - PS5
detail: From PlayStation Studios and Bluepoint Games comes a remake of the PlayStation classic, Demon’s Souls™. Entirely rebuilt from the ground up and masterfully enhanced, this remake invites you to experience the unsettling story and ruthless combat of Demon’s Souls in stunning visual quality with incredible performance.

name: Sackboy: A Big Adventure - PS5
detail: Take Sackboy on an epic 3D platforming adventure with your friends.  Face thrilling, unpredictable challenges as you explore distinctive hand-crafted lands through deeply immersive and expressive controls.

name: Gran Turismo 7 - PS5
detail: Gran Turismo® 7 brings together the very best features of the Real Driving Simulator.
